text: Ndi pamene Satana adakometsa ntchito zawo zopusa nati, “Palibe munthu wina aliyense amene adzakugonjetsani inu lero, ndithudi ine ndidzakhala pafupi kukuthandizani inu.” Koma pamene magulu awiri a nkhondo adakumana, iye adathawa ndipo anati: “Ndithudi ine ndilibe nanu ntchito. Ndithudi ine ndaona zimene inu simungathe kuziona. Ndithudi ine ndiopa Mulungu chifukwa chilango chake ndi choopsya.”
